alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 6:33AM CST until February 19 at 12:25PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... St. Francis River near Patterson .The St. Francis River near Patterson has crested just below moderate flood stage. Water levels will continue to drop...with the river now forecast to fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. For the St. Francis River...including Patterson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Francis River near Patterson. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 8.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
